questions.quote: George. Thanks for coming down to talk to me. I wanted to see you right away, but my hours here aren't very flexible. I just started yesterday.
So, George took my slicer down to Kruger and they're smoothing it out for me.
The woman had an orgasm under false pretences. That's sexual perjury.
I just pray Kruger doesn't realize that it's gone until this guy can fix it up.
You're something. So anyway, when they were in my house before, I didn't offer them anything to drink.
Hey, Babe, your boss called. You owe five bucks for a balloon bouquet. Yeah, he says you can just give it to him tomorrow when you see him.
Maybe we should get married. Maybe everything we need is right here in front of us. Jer... let's do it.
Why do you keep bringing up the bubble boy. You don't have to mention the bubble boy?Â  I know about the bubble boy. I'm aware of the bubble boy. Why do you keep reminding me about the bubble boy?
Hey, you got any extra furniture down there? I need some more stuff to fill that extra bedroom with the walk-in closet.
Her father is so religious, I'm just amazed that he's letting you see her again after that Schindler's List make-out session.
